snippet.title: Adventure Company (by Foursaken Media) Android Gameplay [HD]
snippet.description:
With Adventure Company Game take to the skies and manage your Journey Company, a gaggle of warriors dedicated to exploring and finding ancient relics from a mysterious past.


Google Play link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.foursakenmedia.adventurecompany


==========================================
► SUBSCRIBE HERE:- https://goo.gl/dkAxut
===========================================
► FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER:- goo.gl/edgv25
► LIKE US ON FACEBOOK:- goo.gl/IPs2wI
► CONNECT US ON GOOGLE+:- goo.gl/MuKW3B
============================================


With Adventure Company build a team, discover dozens of categories, level up, learn new skills, and realize powerful instrumentation. Use coming up with and strategy to beat a spread of distinctive environments and eventualities, and ultimately rise to the highest because the best and most profitable company within the land!

ADVENTURE COMPANY GAMEPLAY FEATURES:

- Team-based act/RPG!
- Strategically divide your establishment between battles to seek out long lost artifacts!
- Over sixty categories to discover!
- Explore five completely different lands and collect treasure!
- Equip limitless amounts of weapons!
- Dozens of distinctive enemy types!
- contend to gather daily rewards!
- 3 completely different management schemes, at the side of controller support!


Please Rate, Share and Comment too, really want to entertain all of you, so tell me what you want!

Thank you guys for watching - DroidGameplaysTV
